Content.Text:
<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
To build this house, we'll need
<GREEN>small material stone</GREEN> and <GREEN>small lumber</GREEN>.
30 of each should do it.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you know how to collect
materials, right? Could you collect
<RED>10 small rocks</RED> and <RED>10 small branches</RED>?
<PAGE>
Once you've collected them, go and talk
to Iroha, please. She will turn them
into materials for us.

<FACE_TONI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'll go looking for them too!
I'll race with <MYNAME>!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please gather them right away.
We're counting on you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Where are you going? I need you to find
<RED>10 small rocks</RED> and <RED>10 small branches</RED>
and then talk to <BLUE>Iroha</BLUE>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh?
Less time chatting, more time searching!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Over the last month, four new people
have moved into town.
Isn't that wonderful?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whew... I'm a little tired.
But I have to do my best for Rebecca and
Toni's sake.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're supposed to gather <RED>10 small rocks</RED>
and <RED>10 small branches</RED> and go talk
to Iroha!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Uh...
Looks like you're having trouble finding
the stuff. I'm no good at that, either.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Look how much stuff I found, <MYNAME>!
Amazing, huh?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmm, that's not enough! Please bring me
<RED>10 small rocks</RED> and <RED>10 small branches</RED>.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you very much, <MYNAME>.
I'll turn them into materials right
away.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good.
Now we have all the materials.
Well done.
<PAGE>
I hate to ask, but could you go back to
town now and build the house?

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I saw that you had a <RED>studio</RED>
in your house.
Mind if I use it?

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What, you didn't know?
It's really handy, so I'll tell you
about it after you build the house.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So it's settled! Rebecca will go to
<MYNAME>'s farm.
<PAGE>
The rest of the crew will clean up
around the site where Rebecca's house
will be built.
